benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoiceItems/{invoiceItemId}/customFields - Add custom fields to invoice item

covered: Valid Payload: Multiple scenarios (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC10, TC14, TC18, TC19, TC20, TC21) ensure successful creation with various payload configurations.

Invalid Payload: Tests for malformed request body (TC08), missing request body (TC09), invalid invoice item ID format (TC06), and non-existent invoice item ID (TC05) cover validation and error handling.
Authorization: Test for missing header (TC07) and unauthorized access (TC12) address authorization scenarios.
System Error Handling: Test for service unavailability (TC13) covers server error responses.

Edge Cases: Tests for maximum/minimum lengths (TC19), special characters (TC20), injection/XSS (TC21), large payloads (TC14), response time (TC15), concurrency (TC16), duplicate fields (TC17), persistence verification (TC18), and system state variations (TC22, TC23, TC24, TC25)
gaps: Pagination: No tests cover handling of large datasets requiring pagination.
Caching Behavior: No scenarios test caching headers like ETag or Cache-Control.
Rate Limiting: No tests simulate multiple rapid requests to verify rate limiting or throttling.
Response Content Validation: Limited checks on response body content beyond basic matching; no detailed validation of error message contents or schema validation for responses.
recommendations: Add tests for pagination to verify correct handling of large datasets.
Include scenarios to verify caching headers and cache invalidation behavior.
Implement rate limiting tests to ensure system handles high request volumes gracefully.
Enhance response validation to check error message contents and schema adherence for all error responses.
